automation_yaml:
id: 'time_based_office_wled_automation'
alias: Time-based Office WLED
description: "Time-based office-only automation using Office Wled"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
  - platform: time
    at: '21:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      transition: 1
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '06:00:00'
            before: '09:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 100]
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '17:00:00'
            before: '20:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color: [180, 220, 255]
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '21:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color: [255, 160, 80]
  - delay: '00:00:05'
